org.ojai.store

Interface Query

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Buildable

    @API.Public
 @API.ImmutableOnBuild
public interface Query
extends Buildable
    OJAI interface which lets users build an OJAI Query that can be executed on an OJAI DocumentStore.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Query build()
      Builds this Query object and make it immutable.
      Object getOption(String optionName)
      Returns the value of the named query option.
      Query limit(long limit)
      Restricts the maximum number of documents returned from this query to the specified value.
      Query offset(long offset)
      Zero (0) based index which specifies number of Documents to skip before returning any result.
      Query orderBy(FieldPath... fieldPaths)
      Sets the sort ordering of the returned Documents to the ascending order of specified field paths.
      Query orderBy(FieldPath field, SortOrder order)
      Sets the sort ordering of the returned Documents to the specified field and order.

      Sets the sort ordering of the returned Documents to the ascending order of specified field paths.

    • Method Detail

      • setOption

        Query setOption(@API.NonNullable
                String optionName,
                @API.NonNullable
                Object value)
         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets a named query option. A query option can be used to provide hints to query execution engine. However, under stable conditions, a query option can not alter the result of the query.

        Refer to OJAI Driver's documentation for the list of supported options.

        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • getOption

        Object getOption(@API.NonNullable
                 String optionName)
        Returns the value of the named query option.
        Returns:
        value of the named query option; null if no such option exist

      • setOptions

        Query setOptions(@API.NonNullable
                 Document options)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets multiple query options for this Query.
        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • setTimeout

        Query setTimeout(long timeoutInMilliseconds)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets a duration after which the query will fails with QueryTimeoutException.

        A query timeout occurs when the specified time has passed since a query response was requested, either by calling Iterator.next() on iterator of query's DocumentStream, or between successive callback of DocumentListener.documentArrived(Document).

        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the timeout value is negative

      • waitForTrackedWrites

        Query waitForTrackedWrites(@API.NonNullable
                           String writesContext)
                    throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the writes-context for this query.

        A writes-context allows this query to "see" all the writes that happened inside the writes-context of a DocumentStore.

        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the commit context is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified writes-context can not be parsed
        See Also:
        DocumentStore.beginTrackingWrites(), DocumentStore.beginTrackingWrites(String), DocumentStore.endTrackingWrites()

      • select

        Query select(@API.NonNullable
             String... fieldPaths)
      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Adds the list of field paths to the list of projected fields. If not specified, the entire Document will be returned.

        Multiple invocation will append new fields to the list.

        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • select

        Query select(@API.NonNullable
             FieldPath... fieldPaths)
      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Adds the list of field paths to the list of projected fields. If not specified, the entire Document will be returned.

        Multiple invocation will append new fields to the list.

        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • where

        Query where(@API.NonNullable
            String conditionJson)
     throws OjaiException,
            IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the filtering condition for the query.

        Multiple invocation will 'AND' the individual conditions.

        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        OjaiException
        IllegalArgumentException

      • orderBy

        Query orderBy(@API.NonNullable
              String... fieldPaths)
       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the sort ordering of the returned Documents to the ascending order of specified field paths.

        Multiple invocation will append the field to the sort list.

        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the same field is specified more than once

      • orderBy

        Query orderBy(@API.NonNullable
              FieldPath... fieldPaths)
       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the sort ordering of the returned Documents to the ascending order of specified field paths.

        Multiple invocation will append the field to the sort list.

        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the same field is specified more than once

      • orderBy

        Query orderBy(@API.NonNullable
              String field,
              @API.NonNullable
              String order)
       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the sort ordering of the returned Documents to the specified field and order.

        Multiple invocation will append the field to the sort list.

        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the same field is specified more than once
        IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied field path can not be parsed or order is neither "ASC" or "DESC", ignoring case

      • orderBy

        Query orderBy(@API.NonNullable
              String field,
              @API.NonNullable
              SortOrder order)
       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the sort ordering of the returned Documents to the specified field and order.

        Multiple invocation will append the field to the sort list.

        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the same field is specified more than once

       throws IllegalArgumentException

        Multiple invocation will append the field to the sort list.

        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the same field is specified more than once

      • offset

        Query offset(long offset)
      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Zero (0) based index which specifies number of Documents to skip before returning any result. Negative values are not permitted.

        Multiple invocation will overwrite the previous value.

        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • limit

        Query limit(long limit)
     throws IllegalArgumentException
        Restricts the maximum number of documents returned from this query to the specified value. Negative values are not permitted.

        Multiple invocation will overwrite the previous value.

        Returns:
        this for chained invocation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

        Query build()
        Builds this Query object and make it immutable.
        Specified by:
        build in interface Buildable
        Returns:
        this for chaining
